name: 8. Terminal Chic
description: Terminal-inspired dark theme with system fonts
instructions: Create a terminal/code editor inspired aesthetic with system UI fonts. Use green (#66BB6A) for success/primary elements and yellow (#FFDD33) for warnings/highlights. Perfect for developer-focused content with a retro-modern feel.

image_style.prompt: Create terminal/code editor inspired images with monospace aesthetics and command-line vibes. Use green (#66BB6A) and yellow (#FFDD33) accents on black backgrounds (#0A0A0A). Style should feel like a modern developer terminal with retro influences.
